# Data transformation
The original data provided by the critical care units of the Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center between 2001 and 2012 are available on the following link https://physionet.org/content/mimiciii-demo/1.4/ as SQL table.
Microsoft provides a cleaned csv file on its official github repository: https://github.com/microsoft/r-server-hospital-length-of-stay. 
Our csv is available in the file "Data" and it is named: "LengthOfStay.csv".
